author: gawor
msg: register BlueprintContainer service under bundle's ACC

author: dreiss
msg: THRIFT-413. Suppport for annotations on base types

author: mjakl
msg: Removed sender and receiver state-variables from handlers. Fixes VYSPER-149.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1436 Replaced wait-notify with a semaphores to signal receipt of GetMeta and CPC replies. Simplified code with respect to signaling when the client is ready to send CPC. Replaced two counters with one to determine number of outstanding CASes. The code used casesSent and casesReceived counters. Replaced both with AtomicLong counter that maintains number of outstanding CASes

author: gbrown
msg: Update file browser APIs; copy provided options in Alert and Prompt instead of storing reference to the given array.
